name: Road Driving Simulator
description:
Become the master of highway car racing with high hd graphics smooth control for mobile devices game.
Tap on the gas nose and become a part of the world's most highway car driving, luxury cars and underground!
Win in race and become the best racer of the city!


Features:
- Race the way your own choice you want
- Select your favourite control touch or tilt to steer
- Realistic highway car driving feeling
- Stunning graphics
